original_text: Then shall the trees of the wood sing out at the presence of the Lord, because he cometh to judge the earth.
korean_text: 그리 할 때에 숲 속의 나무들이 여호와 앞에서 즐거이 노래하리니 주께서 땅을 심판하러 오실 것임이로다

sentences.original_text: Then shall the trees of the wood sing out
at the presence of the Lord
because he cometh to judge the earth
